cause.description:
Kathy's 8th Annual Tube for the Cause
When? Saturday, Aug. 1, 2009 10:30 Sign in 11:00 Launch
Where? Delaware River Tubing 3002 Rt. 29 Frenchtown, NJ 08825 Actually the F-town Roller Rink Parking lot. Make sure you tell them you are with our event to not have to pay to park.
How much? $20.00 total to tube $10.00 goes to the Susan G. Komen Breast Cancer Foundation $10.00 goes to your tube and a lunch provided on the river which includes a hot dog/hamburger, chips/candy, drink
Why? Everyone plans on tubing down the Delaware but never gets around to it with friends. Now is your chance to bring some booze, relax, tan, and have a great time all for a great cause and in memory of my amazing mom.
Who? Everyone. And I mean yo mama, your sister, brother, distant 2nd cousin, and best friend of a friend of a friend. Even the bum you met in Frenchtown last night when you were drunk. Everyone.
Where Can I Learn More? kathystubeforthecause.wetpaint.com has donation and further event info as well as past pictures and advertisements
Where Can I Donate? kathystubeforthecause.wetpaint.com has all the information on how to further donate if you are unable to make it to the event Or you can log onto komen.org
or you can donate right here on this website!
1. To raise funds to find a cure for breast cancer.
2. To raise awareness and help early detection.
3. To honor my amazing mom, Kathy.
cause.mission: To find a cure for breast cancer.
cause.name: Kathy's Tube for the Cause
